name: Astro Angler (munty99)
description:
Astro Angler is a relaxing space themed fishing game.

 Catch fish, Sell Fish and buy upgrades to get yourself the best possible space fishing gear and be the envy of all your space fishing friends.

With over 11 fish to catch and 22 items to collect, Astro Angler will keep you engaged for hour(s)

Can you catch them all?
